hackathon-description-text: HackRPI 2017 is the fourth intercollegiate hackathon series hosted at Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute, completely organized and run by RPI students. We will be hosting 500 hackers from the Northeast and beyond for 24 hours.  Students begin working on their hacks on Saturday at 12:00pm and have until Sunday afternoon to complete their hack. All final submissions must be made here, on DevPost, before the end of hacking at 12:00pm on Sunday November 11.

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Amazon Web Services - Best Use of AWS
Best IoT Hack Using a Qualcomm Device

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Audio-Technica ATH-M40x Monitor Headphones. (One for each team member)
Philips Hue Lightstrip Plus Base (6.6'), and a Philips Hue White and Color Ambiance A19 Single Bulb with Richer Colors (Gen 3). (One for each team member)
Amazon Echo(2nd gen) (One for each team member)
$200 visa gift cards for each team member

hackathon-description-header: The fourth annual hackathon at Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute in Troy, NY
